articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Pat Cummins says he is yet to speak to Cricket Australia about search for Justin Langer's replacement
articles.description: Pat Cummins says he expects there will be "some conversations down the track" with Cricket Australia about who will replace Justin Langer's as the national men's coach.
articles.content:
Test captain Pat Cummins says he has not spoken with Cricket Australia (CA) about the process of appointing a new men's head coach following Justin Langer's resignation earlier this month.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
